title: Duty of liquidator to call creditorsâ€™ meeting in case of insolvency.
content: 271.- (1) If, in the case of a winding up commenced after the commencement of this Law, the liquidator is at any time of opinion that the company will not be able to pay its debts in full within the period stated in the declaration under section 266 he shall forthwith summon a meeting of the creditors, and shall lay before the meeting a statement of the assets and liabilities of the company. 4 of 166 of 1987. (2) If the liquidator fails to comply with this section, he shall be liable to a fine not exceeding four hundred twenty-seven euros. Duty of liquidator to call general meeting at end of each year.
